member.name: IDeviceController.AddDevice
member.summary: Adds a DLNA DMR or DMS Device, identified by its UPnP Unique Device Name (UDN), to the list of devices that is returned by the CachedDevices method.
member.param: A string representing the device’s UDN.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IDeviceController.add_DeviceArrival
member.summary: Registers an event handler for the DeviceArrival event.
member.param: Reference to a token that can be used to unregister the event handler.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IDeviceController.add_DeviceDeparture
member.summary: Registers an event handler for the DeviceDeparture event.
member.param: Reference to a token that can be used to unregister the event handler.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IDeviceController.RemoveDevice
member.summary: Removes the specified device from the list of devices that is returned by the CachedDevices method.
member.param: A reference to an IBasicDevice that represents the device to remove from the list.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IDeviceController.remove_DeviceArrival
member.summary: Unregisters an event handler for the DeviceArrival event.
member.param: A reference to a token obtained from the add_DeviceArrival method when the event handler was registered.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IDeviceController.remove_DeviceDeparture
member.summary: Unregisters an event handler for the DeviceDeparture event.
member.param: A reference to a token obtained from the add_DeviceDeparture method when the event handler was registered.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IDeviceController
member.summary: Encapsulates the methods and events needed to retrieve a list of cached Digital Media Renderers (DMRs) and/or Digital Media Servers (DMSs), or to asynchronously find the DMRs and/or DMSs that are currently on the network.
